description: Installation of roof top plant equipment consisting of the following: condenser units, 1 x air handling unit and 1 x attenuator together with associated duct and pipework.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall be commenced within 3 years from the date of this decision.Reason: In order to comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act, 1990.  (As amended)

The rating level of the noise determined by the cumulative sound emissions of the plant hereby permitted shall be at least 5dBA lower than the existing background noise level at any given time of operation. The noise levels shall be measured or predicted 1m externally to any window at the nearest residential facade. Measurements and assessment shall be made according to British Standard 4142:2014.Reason: To safeguard local amenity in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy, Adopted April 2012.
The applicant is advised that the submitted details, as listed above, are considered to be acceptable and that conditions 4, 9, 16 and 17 of 18/16588/FUL are hereby fully discharged.

Condition 4 - Officers have reviewed the submitted information and are satisfied that the proposals would not result in any harm to the significance of the conservation area and would have an acceptable impact on the character and appearance of the area more generally, in accordance with policies CS8, DM10 and DM12 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
As per our discussion, please removed any objects from the Proposed Section AA which may be misinterpreted as a building etc
Please be advised that a fee of Â£145 is required for this application. This can be paid either online at www.kingston.gov.uk or by calling our Customer Service Team on 020 8547 5002
